backend/main.mo: Motoko canister implementing auth-protected user profiles, placeholder product APIs, admin-only product actions, and Stripe configuration handling.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing features, related files, components, tests, and confidence metadata.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing prewritten summaries for multiple frontend source files.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining base styles, color variables, and dark mode theme tokens.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React router configuration defining all public, auth-gated, and admin-gated routes within AppShell.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Login/logout button using Internet Identity with loading and icon states.
frontend/src/components/auth/RequireAdmi: Admin-gated wrapper that checks authentication and admin status, showing an access denied screen otherwise.
frontend/src/components/auth/RequireAuth: Authentication guard showing a sign-in prompt for unauthenticated users.
Layout wrapper combining Header, Footer, main content, and the ProfileSetupModal.
frontend/src/components/layout/Footer.ts: Renders the site footer with quick links, category links, and attribution including dynamic year and referral tracking.
frontend/src/components/layout/Header.ts: Implements a responsive header with navigation, mobile menu, auth-aware links, and admin/user actions.
frontend/src/components/profile/ProfileS: Shows a modal prompting new authenticated users to enter a display name and saves the profile via mutation.
frontend/src/data/catalogTaxonomy.ts: Defines category and brand data plus helper functions to query them.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and invalidates dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdmin.ts: Checks if the current authenticated actor is an admin using a backend call.
frontend/src/hooks/useAuth.ts: Wraps Internet Identity auth, exposing identity state, sign-in/out, and login status.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity context, persistent identity loading, login handling, and identity lifecycle management.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Contains React Query hooks for user profiles, product lookups, and Stripe configuration via the actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base and theme definitions for a blue professional eCommerce style with light/dark mode variables.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and an Internet Identity provider, rendering the App component.
frontend/src/pages/AboutContactPage.tsx: Displays company information, contact details, and business hours using styled cards.
frontend/src/pages/AccountPage.tsx: Fetches and updates the user's profile with form inputs for name, phone, and address.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminDashboardP: Admin landing page listing navigation cards for managing products, orders, users, support, and reports.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminOrdersPage: Displays an empty state for order management with a link back to the admin dashboard.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminProductsPa: Shows a disabled product management interface with an empty state awaiting future features.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminReportsPag: Displays placeholder sales metrics and an empty state for future analytics.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminSupportTic: Shows an empty state for support ticket management with dashboard navigation.
Renders an admin users page with a back button and a placeholder card indicating no registered users yet. Provides UI structure for future user management features.
frontend/src/pages/BrandPage.tsx: Shows brand info from URL params and displays a placeholder when no products exist.
frontend/src/pages/CartPage.tsx: Renders an empty cart message with a link to continue shopping.
frontend/src/pages/CategoryPage.tsx: Shows a category header, its brands grid, and placeholder product listings.
frontend/src/pages/CheckoutPage.tsx: Displays a placeholder checkout screen with links to cart and policy pages.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Home landing page with hero banner and category navigation cards.
frontend/src/pages/OrderDetailsPage.tsx: Shows placeholder order details using an orderId from URL params.
frontend/src/pages/OrdersPage.tsx: Displays an empty orders message with a prompt to start shopping.
frontend/src/pages/PaymentFailurePage.ts: Shows a payment failure message with retry and return-to-cart actions.
frontend/src/pages/PaymentSuccessPage.ts: Shows a confirmation message after successful payment with links to orders and home.
frontend/src/pages/PrivacyPolicyPage.tsx: Displays the site's privacy policy with sections on data collection, use, security, and rights.
frontend/src/pages/ProductDetailsPage.ts: Renders a placeholder product detail view using the productId param with static info and disabled cart button.
frontend/src/pages/SupportPage.tsx: Provides a form for submitting support tickets with client-side validation and simulated submission.
frontend/src/pages/TermsPage.tsx: Shows the site's terms and conditions with sections on products, pricing, orders, returns, and more.
frontend/src/utils/errors.ts: Provides utility functions for extracting user-friendly error messages and logging auth or mutation errors. Handles specific auth-related message patterns.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading URL parameters, persisting them in sessionStorage, and retrieving them with fallback. Includes helpers for managing hash-based routing parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending theme colors, fonts, shadows, animations, and enabling plugins like typography and container queries.
project_state.json: Stores current project metadata including features, architecture notes, known issues, and required images for a multiâ€‘vendor eCommerce app.
